song.title: Hosanna (Praise is Rising)
song.lyrics:
[1] .G Praise is rising . C Eyes are turning to You . G We turn to You || .G Hope is stirring . C Hearts are yearning for You . G We long for You
[P] . D When we see You . C G We find the strength to face the day || . D In Your presence . C G All our fears are washed away . D Washed away
[C] .Gsus G Em C Hosanna, hosanna . G D You are the God who saves us . Em C Worthy of all our praises || .Gsus G Em C Hosanna, hosanna . G D Come have Your way among us . Em C We welcome You here Lord Jesus ---
[2] .G Hear the sound of . C Hearts returning to You . G We turn to You || .G In Your kingdom . C Broken lives are made new . G You make us new
song.presentation: 1 P C 2 P C P C
